articles.author: Ritu Sharma
articles.title: Top US Scientist ‘Slams’ India’s Agni-V Missile Test; Says New Delhi Could ‘Disarm’ Pakistan With MIRV Tech - EurAsian Times
articles.description: India test-fired long-range ballistic missile Agni-V with Multiple Independently Targetable Re-entry Vehicle (MIRV) baffling China, Pakistan
articles.content: In what could be termed as adopting a more flexible deterrence vis-à-vis its two aggressive nuclear-powered countries China and Pakistan – India on March 11 successfully test-fired a long-range balli… [+6855 chars]
